member.name: M:CefSharp.WinForms.Internals.ControlExtensions.InvokeOnUiThreadIfRequired(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Action)
member.summary: Executes the Action asynchronously on the UI thread, does not block execution on the calling thread.
member.param: the control for which the update is required
action to be performed on the control

member.name: P:CefSharp.WinForms.ChromiumWebBrowser.Focused
member.summary: Manually implement Focused because cef does not implement it.
member.remarks: This is also how the Microsoft's WebBrowserControl implements the Focused property.
